text: The Great Redeemer is a 1920 American western drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and Maurice Tourneur and stars House Peters, Marjorie Daw, Jack McDonald, Joseph Singleton. It was distributed by Metro Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s Western (genre) movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown Category:Movies directed by Maurice Tourneur
title: The Great Redeemer
